allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AI Domain Name Generator \(Namer.ai\)

Next.js 14 app with OpenAI domain generation, Namecheap availability
checking, Prisma/PostgreSQL database, Stripe subscription support,
and affiliate link tracking.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cd /c/domeincheck && npx prisma migrate dev --name add-lqs-and-trademark 2>&1)
Bash(cd /c/domeincheck && echo "y" | npx prisma migrate reset --force 2>&1)
Bash(cd /c/domeincheck && npx prisma migrate dev --name init-with-lqs-and-trademark 2>&1)
Bash(cd C:/domeincheck && npx prisma migrate dev --name add-saved-domains 2>&1)
